title: Caregiver advocacy when medical system fails patient
description: Caregiver advocacy when medical system fails patient
content:
Scenario: Caregiver advocacy when medical system fails patient
    Given medical systems sometimes fail patients with complex needs
    And James must advocate for David's appropriate care
    When the healthcare_elohim detects inadequate care
    Then it should alert James to system failures
    And it should provide information for advocacy
    And it should help James escalate concerns effectively
    And caregiver should be empowered to demand appropriate care
    And healthcare system should be accountable to patient and caregiver
